parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Excessive Wheel Bearing Grease Contamination of Brake Components
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive wheel bearing grease can contaminate the brake components, leading to severely diminished braking action, which can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Overloading the axles and wheel bearings can lead to premature failure, causing loss of control, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: warning messages on the dashboard regarding trailer brake malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inaccurate Gross Axle Weight Rating (GAWR) and Load Capacity
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inaccurate GAWR and load capacity can lead to axle and wheel bearing overload, causing premature failure, loss of control, accidents, and costly repairs.
symptoms: Discrepancies between stated GAWR and actual load capacity
wheel bearings and axles failing prematurely

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the axle seals can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to reduced stopping power and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Leaking grease from the axle seals

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wheel hub seals can cause grease to leak onto the wheels and brakes, contaminating them and leading to a decrease in braking ability, which can increase the risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Fire Hazard in Motion-Sensing Lights
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning motion-sensing lights can cause electrical fires, posing a significant risk to the safety of occupants and potentially leading to destruction of property.
symptoms: Smoke and indication of fire within the light itself

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure Leading to Fire
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause fires, resulting in destruction of property and potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
